text: Alberto Maffei (born 11 May 1995) is an Italian snowboarder. He competed in the 2017 FIS Snowboard World Championships, and in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in big air. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Italy Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:People from Trentino
title: Alberto Maffei
